thread.title: OfficialEmailMarketing.com Turns Five, Email List Remains Day Old
thread.title_full: OfficialEmailMarketing.com Turns Five, Email List Remains Day Old

title: OfficialEmailMarketing.com Turns Five, Email List Remains Day Old
text: Reprint KELOWNA, British Columbia , Aug. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- OfficialEmailMarketing.com , one of the forerunners in email marketing services, is celebrating its fifth anniversary this year. Company executives announced the celebration in a press briefing today. After five years, the company still runs the freshest email lists that are updated daily, a commitment that the company has been doing on a daily basis since day one as one of the world's leader in email marketing. OfficialEmailMarketing.com are specialists on fresh and updated products like bulk email list, bulk email software, international email list, USA businesses list, email data feed and targeted email list. "OfficialEmailMarketing.com will always be about the best quality data at the best possible rates as we are in the customer relationship business," said CEO Rodney Gray , upbeat and optimistic during the company celebration. "Email marketing is one of the most cost effective ways to send your corporate message out to potential customers online. A good quality targeted email list can allow you to pinpoint only specific consumers that have an active interest in your product or service," he added. Business to business covered by the company includes book bovers and ebook, business opportunity seekers, college students, computer and tech savvy, Christian men & women, credit and loan inquiries, dating and romance, debt inquiries, discount seekers, entertainment, financial stocks, forex, small cap, fitness and personal training, gamblers & betting, income targeted high income, insurance inquiries, job seekers, health & nutrition, home owners, mortgage loans & refinancing, music (general music lovers), online shoppers, payday loans, religion (general religion), social networking, sports enthusiasts, travel & vacation planning, weight loss men & woman. Other products and services can be viewed at OfficialEmailMarketing.com . About OfficialEmailMarketing.com: Operating from the company headquarters at Kelowna, BC , Canada , OfficialEmailMarketing.com was founded in March 2010 and has grown as one of the premier online companies for email marketing services with high quality lists at affordable prices. It allowed the company to keep long-term clients and maintain a positive relationship with every customer that purchases and uses the company's services. Email marketing is the only type of marketing that allows clients keep your marketing tools and build growing database of customers, a feature that adds tremendous value to the clients' marketing capabilities. Contact: Rodney Gray 8886695399
